definition.name: Close Stale Issues
definition.description: Close issues and pull requests with no recent activity
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: repo-token
inputs.description: Token for the repository. Can be passed in using `{{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}`.

inputs.name: stale-issue-message
inputs.description: The message to post on the issue when tagging it. If none provided, will not mark issues stale.

inputs.name: stale-pr-message
inputs.description: The message to post on the pull request when tagging it. If none provided, will not mark pull requests stale.

inputs.name: close-issue-message
inputs.description: The message to post on the issue when closing it. If none provided, will not comment when closing an issue.

inputs.name: close-pr-message
inputs.description: The message to post on the pull request when closing it. If none provided, will not comment when closing a pull requests.

inputs.name: days-before-stale
inputs.description: The number of days old an issue or a pull request can be before marking it stale. Set to -1 to never mark issues or pull requests as stale automatically.

inputs.name: days-before-issue-stale
inputs.description: The number of days old an issue can be before marking it stale. Set to -1 to never mark issues as stale automatically. Override "days-before-stale" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: days-before-pr-stale
inputs.description: The number of days old a pull request can be before marking it stale. Set to -1 to never mark pull requests as stale automatically. Override "days-before-stale" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: days-before-close
inputs.description: The number of days to wait to close an issue or a pull request after it being marked stale. Set to -1 to never close stale issues or pull requests.

inputs.name: days-before-issue-close
inputs.description: The number of days to wait to close an issue after it being marked stale. Set to -1 to never close stale issues. Override "days-before-close" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: days-before-pr-close
inputs.description: The number of days to wait to close a pull request after it being marked stale. Set to -1 to never close stale pull requests. Override "days-before-close" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: stale-issue-label
inputs.description: The label to apply when an issue is stale.

inputs.name: close-issue-label
inputs.description: The label to apply when an issue is closed.

inputs.name: exempt-issue-labels
inputs.description: The labels that mean an issue is exempt from being marked stale. Separate multiple labels with commas (eg. "label1,label2").

inputs.name: close-issue-reason
inputs.description: The reason to use when closing an issue.

inputs.name: stale-pr-label
inputs.description: The label to apply when a pull request is stale.

inputs.name: close-pr-label
inputs.description: The label to apply when a pull request is closed.

inputs.name: exempt-pr-labels
inputs.description: The labels that mean a pull request is exempt from being marked as stale. Separate multiple labels with commas (eg. "label1,label2").

inputs.name: exempt-milestones
inputs.description: The milestones that mean an issue or a pull request is exempt from being marked as stale. Separate multiple milestones with commas (eg. "milestone1,milestone2").

inputs.name: exempt-issue-milestones
inputs.description: The milestones that mean an issue is exempt from being marked as stale. Separate multiple milestones with commas (eg. "milestone1,milestone2"). Override "exempt-milestones" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: exempt-pr-milestones
inputs.description: The milestones that mean a pull request is exempt from being marked as stale. Separate multiple milestones with commas (eg. "milestone1,milestone2"). Override "exempt-milestones" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: exempt-all-milestones
inputs.description: Exempt all issues and pull requests with milestones from being marked as stale. Default to false.

inputs.name: exempt-all-issue-milestones
inputs.description: Exempt all issues with milestones from being marked as stale. Override "exempt-all-milestones" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: exempt-all-pr-milestones
inputs.description: Exempt all pull requests with milestones from being marked as stale. Override "exempt-all-milestones" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: only-labels
inputs.description: Only issues or pull requests with all of these labels are checked if stale. Defaults to `` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of labels.

inputs.name: any-of-labels
inputs.description: Only issues or pull requests with at least one of these labels are checked if stale. Defaults to `` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of labels.

inputs.name: any-of-issue-labels
inputs.description: Only issues with at least one of these labels are checked if stale. Defaults to `` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of labels. Override "any-of-labels" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: any-of-pr-labels
inputs.description: Only pull requests with at least one of these labels are checked if stale. Defaults to `` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of labels. Override "any-of-labels" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: only-issue-labels
inputs.description: Only issues with all of these labels are checked if stale. Defaults to `[]` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of labels. Override "only-labels" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: only-pr-labels
inputs.description: Only pull requests with all of these labels are checked if stale. Defaults to `[]` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of labels. Override "only-labels" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: operations-per-run
inputs.description: The maximum number of operations per run, used to control rate limiting (GitHub API CRUD related).

inputs.name: remove-stale-when-updated
inputs.description: Remove stale labels from issues and pull requests when they are updated or commented on.

inputs.name: remove-issue-stale-when-updated
inputs.description: Remove stale labels from issues when they are updated or commented on. Override "remove-stale-when-updated" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: remove-pr-stale-when-updated
inputs.description: Remove stale labels from pull requests when they are updated or commented on. Override "remove-stale-when-updated" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: debug-only
inputs.description: Run the processor in debug mode without actually performing any operations on live issues.

inputs.name: ascending
inputs.description: The order to get issues or pull requests. Defaults to false, which is descending.

inputs.name: sort-by
inputs.description: What to sort results by. Valid options are `created`, `updated`, and `comments`. Defaults to `created`.

inputs.name: delete-branch
inputs.description: Delete the git branch after closing a stale pull request.

inputs.name: start-date
inputs.description: The date used to skip the stale action on issue/pull request created before it (ISO 8601 or RFC 2822).

inputs.name: exempt-assignees
inputs.description: The assignees which exempt an issue or a pull request from being marked as stale. Separate multiple assignees with commas (eg. "user1,user2").

inputs.name: exempt-issue-assignees
inputs.description: The assignees which exempt an issue from being marked as stale. Separate multiple assignees with commas (eg. "user1,user2"). Override "exempt-assignees" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: exempt-pr-assignees
inputs.description: The assignees which exempt a pull request from being marked as stale. Separate multiple assignees with commas (eg. "user1,user2"). Override "exempt-assignees" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: exempt-all-assignees
inputs.description: Exempt all issues and pull requests with assignees from being marked as stale. Default to false.

inputs.name: exempt-all-issue-assignees
inputs.description: Exempt all issues with assignees from being marked as stale. Override "exempt-all-assignees" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: exempt-all-pr-assignees
inputs.description: Exempt all pull requests with assignees from being marked as stale. Override "exempt-all-assignees" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: exempt-draft-pr
inputs.description: Exempt draft pull requests from being marked as stale. Default to false.

inputs.name: enable-statistics
inputs.description: Display some statistics at the end regarding the stale workflow (only when the logs are enabled).

inputs.name: labels-to-add-when-unstale
inputs.description: A comma delimited list of labels to add when an issue or pull request becomes unstale.

inputs.name: labels-to-remove-when-stale
inputs.description: A comma delimited list of labels to remove when an issue or pull request becomes stale.

inputs.name: labels-to-remove-when-unstale
inputs.description: A comma delimited list of labels to remove when an issue or pull request becomes unstale.

inputs.name: ignore-updates
inputs.description: Any update (update/comment) can reset the stale idle time on the issues and pull requests.

inputs.name: ignore-issue-updates
inputs.description: Any update (update/comment) can reset the stale idle time on the issues. Override "ignore-updates" option regarding only the issues.

inputs.name: ignore-pr-updates
inputs.description: Any update (update/comment) can reset the stale idle time on the pull requests. Override "ignore-updates" option regarding only the pull requests.

inputs.name: include-only-assigned
inputs.description: Only the issues or the pull requests with an assignee will be marked as stale automatically.

inputs.name: only-issue-types
inputs.description: Only issues with a matching type are processed as stale/closed. Defaults to `[]` (disabled) and can be a comma-separated list of issue types.

outputs.name: closed-issues-prs
outputs.description: List of all closed issues and pull requests.

outputs.name: staled-issues-prs
outputs.description: List of all staled issues and pull requests.

evidence.reasoning: This action is primarily focused on managing stale issues and pull requests, which involves communication with users about the status of their contributions. It also contributes to code quality by helping maintain an active and relevant issue tracker.
